verses.name: Jeremiah 31:9
verses.text: They shall come with weeping, and with supplications will I lead them: I will cause them to walk by the rivers of waters in a straight way, wherein they shall not stumble: for I am a father to Israel, and Ephraim is my firstborn.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:10
verses.text: Hear the word of the Lord, O ye nations, and declare it in the isles afar off, and say, He that scattered Israel will gather him, and keep him, as a shepherd doth his flock.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:11
verses.text: For the Lord hath redeemed Jacob, and ransomed him from the hand of him that was stronger than he.
